homePage.title: Buy Together, Save More
homePage.slogan: Save more on every purchase with Mimi, a group-buying platform that lets you and your friends unlock exclusive discounts. Shop together, enjoy better prices, and make every purchase more affordable through Mimiâ€™s community-driven deals.
homePage.instruction-2: Invite friends or join an existing group.
homePage.instruction-3: Save big when the group completes the order!
homePage.no-featured-deals: No featured deals available at the moment.

footer.about-text: At Mimi, we believe in the power of collective shopping! Our platform offers an innovative way to make purchases more affordable through group buying. By bringing shoppers together, we create opportunities for everyone to enjoy significant discounts on a wide range of exciting products.
footer.payment-methods-text: We accept payments via Uzcard and Humo cards through our payment form Delivery addresses are collected before payment, as items are sent exclusively through delivery.
